rows.label: qst202505_msg0001
rows.name:
I see. So the light confirmed
at the World Tree was from
that Blade's attack.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0002
rows.name:
It's hard to believe a Blade
possesses such power.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0003
rows.name:
I know, right? Even we,
who saw it up close,
couldn't believe our eyes.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0004
rows.name: But it's a fact.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0005
rows.name:
If it weren't for KOS-MOS Re:'s
attack, we would have been defeated
by the artificial Blades.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmm, if it's under control, then
I suppose there's no problem.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0007
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]I understand the situation.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0008
rows.name:
The matter of the artificial
Blades is indeed a threat
that cannot be ignored.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0009
rows.name:
They can fly, can't they?
There's no guarantee they'll
stay at the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0010
rows.name:
Berserk artificial Blades flying
to other countries...[ML:Dash ] That
possibility doesn't seem low.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0011
rows.name: That is certainly a concern.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0012
rows.name:
I will use the Luxurian
army to strengthen surveillance
of the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0013
rows.name:
We are grateful for your
wise decision, King Serich.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0014
rows.name:
However, I believe we'll
need to cooperate with other
countries on this matter.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0015
rows.name:
What do you say, Meleph-dono?
Would you be willing to
lend us your strength?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0016
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0017
rows.name:
I will report this matter to Superbia
and advise His Majesty the Emperor
to devise countermeasures.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0018
rows.name:
I am in your debt, Meleph-dono.
Please, I leave it to you.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0019
rows.name:
Ah, and there is one more thing I
would like to ask of you all...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0020
rows.name: A favor?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0021
rows.name: What, is there something else?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0022
rows.name: Come in.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0023
rows.name: Who's that?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0024
rows.name: An acquaintance of yours, Turtle-chan?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0025
rows.name: Hmm? No, I don't recall...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0026
rows.name:
A pleasure to meet you,
ojisan. My name is Astelle.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0027
rows.name: I look forward to getting to know you!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0028
rows.name: O-Ojisan?! What's this about, old man?!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0029
rows.name: This child is your cousin's daughter.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0030
rows.name: Well, it's no surprise you don't know.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0031
rows.name:
She was born after you
fled this country.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0032
rows.name:
She's your first cousin once
removed. Remember that, ojisan.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0033
rows.name:
"O-ojisan"... Even if you tell
me that all of a sudden...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0034
rows.name: Heh. Be nice to her, ojisan.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0035
rows.name: Shut it!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0036
rows.name:
At her age, Astelle is a
prodigy who has read every
book in the Teos Aure library.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0037
rows.name:
Luxuria must be feeling small
to her. And she has a bit
of a tomboyish nature.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0038
rows.name:
Recently, she started saying she
wants to explore the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0039
rows.name:
When I scolded her, saying I'd never
allow such a dangerous thing...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0040
rows.name:
she started making a fuss about
wanting to travel to various
countries before Alst ends.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0041
rows.name:
But you're the one who said I should
see the world, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0042
rows.name:
I'm just trying to follow
your instructions.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0043
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]You see what I have to deal with?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0044
rows.name:
I don't know who she takes after with
her stubbornness, but once she makes
up her mind, she won't budge an inch.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0045
rows.name: So, I apologize for the trouble, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0046
rows.name:
could I ask you to take this
child with you to Superbia?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0047
rows.name:
Asking us that... What
an absurd thing to say.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0048
rows.name:
We're not just playing
around here, you know.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0049
rows.name: I know that much.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0050
rows.name:
It's fine, don't worry. I promise
I won't cause any trouble.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0051
rows.name:
If you'd like, I could even
help you out, ojisan.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0052
rows.name:
S-Stop with the "ojisan"! At
least call me "onii-chan"!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0053
rows.name:
Hmph. Then, I look forward
to it, Zeke-onii-chan!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0055
rows.name:
Whoa, Turtle-chan... I didn't
know you had that kind of hobby.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0056
rows.name:
Prince, this isn't funny.
Even I'm a bit creeped out.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0057
rows.name: Be quiet!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0058
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]You, what's your name?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0059
rows.name: I am KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0060
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]KOS-MOS? A strange name.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0061
rows.name: Are you a Blade?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0062
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0063
rows.name: Hmm, what an incredible body.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0064
rows.name:
Almost like a machine. Is it
fused with biological parts?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0065
rows.name: Um, is there a problem with my body?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0066
rows.name: Eh? No, no problem.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0067
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Hey, would you mind if I tinkered
with your insides a bit?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0068
rows.name: No, I cannot permit that.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0069
rows.name:
Even under orders from my Master, I
would find it difficult to comply.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0070
rows.name:
Hmph, so it's a no, huh.
Can't be helped...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202505_msg0071
rows.name:
Well, whatever! I look forward to
working with you, KOS-MOS Re:!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0072
rows.name: I look forward to it as well, Astelle.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0073
rows.name: Then, let's depart at once!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0074
rows.name:
Come on, show me the
way, Zeke-onii-chan!

rows.label: qst202505_msg0075
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Urgh...

rows.label: qst202505_msg0076
rows.name: What's with the hesitation, onii-chan?

rows.label: qst202505_msg0077
rows.name:
We're leaving you
behind, Zeke-onii-chan.

rows.label: qst202505_msg0078
rows.name: You all, knock it off!
